meanings.definition: Showing or suggesting a liking for physical activities or sports
meanings.sent1: She chose the sporty outfit for her tennis match.
meanings.sent2: The sporty kids were always playing soccer during recess.
meanings.sent3: The sporty dog loved chasing after the ball in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her sporty spirit shone brightly during the marathon.
meanings.sent5: The sporty car zoomed past us on the highway.

meanings.definition: Having a lively, energetic, or casual style or appearance
meanings.sent1: He had a sporty haircut that matched his vibrant personality.
meanings.sent2: The sporty music at the party got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent3: The sporty hat added a fun touch to her outfit.
meanings.sent4: Her sporty attitude made her the life of the party.
meanings.sent5: The sporty sneakers completed his cool and casual look.
